response.summary: A child’s drawing shows two people in bright clothing standing before a jagged mountain range. Across the mountains is a colorful German message reading 'Nächstes Mal Komm Ich Mit' (Next time I come with). In the bottom right, a separate white card displays the date 02.08.2014 in red ink. The scene appears playful and spontaneous, created with crayons and simple shapes.
response.title: Next Time I Come
response.creator: Unknown child
